txt.en: 'A while ago, I sent Answith, one of our scouts, to keep an eye on Brôntrig. The last news we had received from him was that he had set up camp near a tower west of Brôntrig. We have heard naught from him since.\n\n'Will you travel south and west to the tower and find out if Answith is well? Lend aid to him if he is in need.'
'Your arrival could not have come at a better time, [placeholder]. Several of the sentries from Brôntrig had been closing in on my position before you drove them away.'
Ardwyn sent a scout to keep a watchful eye on Brôntrig, but the Rohirrim have heard no word from him.
Talk to Answith in the Isendale
Answith is encamped on the far side of a tower west of Brôntrig and south of Forthbrond.\n\nArdwyn asked you to find the scout Answith and lend him your aid.
